data.title: Which Agent is known for their signature ability to create walls of ice?
Which map features a teleporter that can transport players between two sites?
What is the name of the currency used to purchase weapons and abilities in Valorant?
Which Agent's ultimate ability can revive fallen teammates?
What is the name of the spike-defusing robot that can be deployed by defenders?
Which Agent is known for their ability to control areas with poison clouds?
How many rounds are needed to win a standard Valorant match?
Which Agent's ultimate ability can suppress enemy abilities for a short duration?
What is the name of the sidearm that all Agents start with?
Which map features three distinct sites, instead of the usual two?
Which Agent is known for their ability to create fake footsteps to deceive enemies?
What is the name of the sniper rifle that can one-shot enemies with a headshot?
Which Agent's ultimate ability can create a temporary copy of themselves?
How many Agents can a team choose in a standard Valorant match?
What is the name of the ability that allows Sova to shoot recon arrows that reveal enemies?
Which map features a unique environmental hazard in the form of a rotating carousel?
